CustomField.description: This is the greeting salutation as it might be used in a letter or email such as "Mr. Smith", "Dr. and Mr. Brown" or "Jack and Jill". This field can contain 40 characters.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the greeting salutation as it might be used in a letter or email such as "Mr. Smith", "Dr. and Mr. Brown" or "Jack and Jill". This field can contain 40 characters.
CustomField.label: Account Greeting
